verses.text: And if a \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w swearing|strong="H0423"\w*, and \add is\add* a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w*, \w whether|strong="H0176"\w* he hath \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* or \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \add of it;\add* if he do not \w utter|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add*, then he shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

Or if a \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* any \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, whether \add it be\add* a \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* of an \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w*, or a \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* of \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, or the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* of \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* creeping \w things|strong="H8318"\w*, and \add if\add* it be \w hidden|strong="H5956"\w* from him; he also shall be \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, and \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*.

Or if he \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* the \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, whatsoever \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* \add it be\add* that a man shall be \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* withal, and it be \w hid|strong="H5956"\w* from him; when he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \add of it\add*, then he shall be \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*.

Or if a \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w*, \w pronouncing|strong="H0981"\w* with \add his\add* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* to do \w evil|strong="H7489"\w*, or to do \w good|strong="H3190"\w*, whatsoever \add it be\add* that a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall \w pronounce|strong="H0981"\w* with an \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*, and it be \w hid|strong="H5956"\w* from him; when he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \add of it\add*, then he shall be \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of these.

And it shall be, when he shall be \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of these \add things\add*, that he shall \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* that he hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* in that \add thing:\add*

And he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* his trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* which he hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, a \w female|strong="H5347"\w* from the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, a \w lamb|strong="H3776"\w* or a \w kid|strong="H8166"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*, for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him concerning his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

And if \w he|strong="H3027"\w* be not \w able|strong="H1767"\w* to \w bring|strong="H5060"\w* a \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*, then he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H0854"\w* his \w trespass|strong="H0817"\w*, which he hath \w committed|strong="H2398"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w turtledoves|strong="H8449"\w*, or \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*, unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w one|strong="H0259"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.\f + \fr 5.7 \ft he be…: Heb. his hand cannot reach to the sufficiency of a lamb\f*

And he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, who shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \add that\add* which \add is\add* for the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, and wring \w off|strong="H4454"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w from|strong="H4136"\w* his \w neck|strong="H6203"\w*, but shall not divide \add it\add* \w asunder|strong="H0914"\w*:

And he shall \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* upon the \w side|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; and the \w rest|strong="H7604"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall be wrung \w out|strong="H4680"\w* at the \w bottom|strong="H3247"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: it \add is\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

And he shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, according to the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him for his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* which he hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* him.\f + \fr 5.10 \ft manner: or, ordinance\f*

¶ But if \w he|strong="H3027"\w* be not able to \w bring|strong="H5381"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w turtledoves|strong="H8449"\w*, or \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*, then he that \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* for his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* part of an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; he shall \w put|strong="H7760"\w* no \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* upon it, neither shall he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add any\add* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* thereon: for it \add is\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

Then shall he \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* it to the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H7061"\w* his \w handful|strong="H4393"\w* of it, \add even\add* a \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* thereof, and \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \add it\add* on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, according to the offerings made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it \add is\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him as touching his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* that he hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of these, and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* him: and \add the remnant\add* shall be the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w*, as a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

If a \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w commit|strong="H4603"\w* a \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w*, and \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* through \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w*, in the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; then he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* for his \w trespass|strong="H0817"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* out of the \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, with thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* by \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, for a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*:

And he shall make \w amends|strong="H7999"\w* for the \w harm|strong="H2398"\w* that he hath done in the holy \w thing|strong="H6944"\w*, and shall \w add|strong="H3254"\w* the fifth \w part|strong="H2549"\w* thereto, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him with the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*, and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* him.

¶ And if a \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, and \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of these things which are forbidden to be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* by the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; though he \w wist|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add* not, yet is he \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*, and shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

And he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* out of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, with thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w*, for a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*, unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him concerning his \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w* wherein he \w erred|strong="H7683"\w* and \w wist|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add* not, and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* him.
It \add is\add* a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*: he hath \w certainly|strong="H0816"\w* \w trespassed|strong="H0816"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
